mapper.insert: insert into project_trace( pt_id, prj_no, prj_name, prj_states, prj_lv, business_type, prj_addr, fill_time, isbid, trace_department, predict_prj_scale, prj_desc, pt_info, pt_user) values(#{trace.ptId},#{trace.prjNo},#{trace.prjName},#{trace.prjStates},#{trace.prjLv},#{trace.businessType},#{trace.prjAddr}, #{trace.fillTime},#{trace.isbid},#{trace.traceDepartment},#{trace.predictPrjScale},#{trace.prjDesc}, #{trace.ptInfo},#{trace.ptUser})
mapper.select: SELECT pt_id, prj_no, prj_name, prj_states, prj_lv, business_type, prj_addr, fill_time, isbid, trace_department, predict_prj_scale, prj_desc, pt_info, pt_user,om_name FROM project_trace as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.pt_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN organization_management as c on a.trace_department=c.om_id where b.status=#{status}

SELECT pt_id, prj_no, prj_name, prj_states, prj_lv, business_type, prj_addr, fill_time, isbid, trace_department, predict_prj_scale, prj_desc, pt_info, pt_user,om_name FROM project_trace as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.pt_id=b.mode_id LEFT JOIN organization_management as c on a.trace_department=c.om_id where a.pt_id=#{id}
select prj_states from project_trace as a LEFT JOIN mode_status as b on a.pt_id=b.mode_id where prj_name=#{prjName} and b.status=2
SELECT COUNT(1) FROM project_trace where fill_time =#{time}
